body:
When trying to use GURL as URL parser (a minimal initial integration effort (PoC on linking) of it can be observed in https://github.com/envoyproxy/envoy/pull/11670), I faced the following error on macOS and Windows:

```
ERROR: An error occurred during the fetch of repository 'com_googlesource_googleurl':
   java.io.IOException: Error extracting  
```

Since from the downloaded archive, `http_archive` tries to extract `build` dir while the `BUILD` file is already extracted (the case for `BUILD` file is extracted before the build directory from the tarball or vice-versa) hence `http_archive` throws an error. It happens only for systems with a case-insensitive filesystem e.g. used by Windows and macOS.

Currently, I used a temporary repackaged archive (by renaming `BUILD` to `BUILD.bazel`).

cc. @danzh2010 @htuch 

Previous discussion: https://github.com/envoyproxy/envoy/pull/10599#discussion_r402638477.

```
$ ls -la /private/var/tmp/_bazel_dio/ec97df638f335f38ea0eb318d327853e/external/com_googlesource_googleurl/
total 736
drwxr-xr-x    9 dio  wheel     288 Jun 20 13:19 .
drwxr-xr-x  207 dio  wheel    6624 Jun 20 13:19 ..
-rw-r--r--    1 dio  wheel   43267 Mar 25 01:17 AUTHORS
-rw-r--r--    1 dio  wheel       8 Mar 25 01:17 BUILD
-rw-r--r--    1 dio  wheel    1559 Mar 25 01:17 LICENSE
-rw-r--r--    1 dio  wheel     908 Mar 25 01:17 README.md
-rw-r--r--    1 dio  wheel     204 Mar 25 01:17 WORKSPACE
drwxr-xr-x   12 dio  wheel     384 Jun 20 13:19 base
-rw-r--r--    1 dio  wheel  314942 Jun 20 13:19 googleurl_dbf5ad147f60afc125e99db7549402af49a5eae8.tar.gz
```

Complete error log on macOS on [CI](https://dev.azure.com/cncf/4684fb3d-0389-4e0b-8251-221942316e06/_apis/build/builds/42704/logs/31):

```
  2020-06-21T06:41:59.7730360Z INFO: Repository com_googlesource_googleurl instantiated at:
2020-06-21T06:41:59.7745840Z   no stack (--record_rule_instantiation_callstack not enabled)
2020-06-21T06:41:59.7746720Z Repository rule http_archive defined at:
2020-06-21T06:41:59.7747550Z   /private/var/tmp/_bazel_runner/b961792e7cffa44c65ef18ea8508602b/external/bazel_tools/tools/build_defs/repo/http.bzl:336:16: in <toplevel>
2020-06-21T06:41:59.7823820Z ERROR: An error occurred during the fetch of repository 'com_googlesource_googleurl':
2020-06-21T06:41:59.7825520Z    java.io.IOException: Error extracting /private/var/tmp/_bazel_runner/b961792e7cffa44c65ef18ea8508602b/external/com_googlesource_googleurl/googleurl_dbf5ad147f60afc125e99db7549402af49a5eae8.tar.gz to /private/var/tmp/_bazel_runner/b961792e7cffa44c65ef18ea8508602b/external/com_googlesource_googleurl: /private/var/tmp/_bazel_runner/b961792e7cffa44c65ef18ea8508602b/external/com_googlesource_googleurl/build (Not a directory)
```
title: deps: Move com_googlesource_googleurl top-level BUILD file to a sub-dir
